app.revision_history: Handle VERSION '2' of the Vivado Tcl custom commands
app.name: questa_cdc
app.summary: This is a Mentor, a Siemens Business, app to generate the script file of the design to run it in Questa CDC. The App takes user inputs for the design-top name and an optional argument for the output directory in which the script files will be generated: eg-: write_questa_cdc_script top -output_directory QCDC_FILES, where top is the design-top and QCDC_FILES is the name of the output directory. To run Questa CDC, ensure that the required software and the licenses are available. You can run Questa CDC though the command: sh qcdc_run.sh.

proc.name: write_questa_cdc_script
proc.summary: This proc generates the Questa CDC script file
